subject: reflecting on my life as a soccer player

scene1.narration: Every bruise, every sprint, every moment I questioned if I was good enough. This beautiful game broke me down.
scene1.image: Close-up of muddy soccer cleats on wet grass, with a worn soccer ball nearby. Rain droplets visible on the ground. Player's legs show dirt stains and grass marks.

scene2.narration: But it also built me into someone who never gives up. Soccer didn't just teach me to play—it taught me to fight.
scene2.image: Soccer player in golden hour sunlight, arms raised in celebration after scoring a goal. Stadium lights glowing softly in background. Pure joy and determination on their face.

storyboard.fullNarration:
Every bruise, every sprint, every moment I questioned if I was good enough. This beautiful game broke me down.

But it also built me into someone who never gives up. Soccer didn't just teach me to play—it taught me to fight.
